item.title: Prison Game - Prison Runner
item.description: One fine day, there was a riot in a maximum security prison, which many prisoners took advantage of, trying to escape. Among them was you. Now you have to overcome more than 30 levels that separate you from freedom. At your disposal there are unique skills gained over the years in prisons, as well as an impressive arsenal of weapons.
